headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. For this endpoint, use application/json .

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the test lead is under an ad account. Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the test lead is under a form library of a Business Center. ID of a form library.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: The ID of the test lead that you want to delete. To obtain the ID of the existing test lead, use /page/lead/mock/get/ .
